content: **knitted neck-warmer and hat in drops puna and drops kid-silk or drops merino extra fine and drops kid-silk the piece is worked with rib and cables ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ see the frosted braid neck-warmer pattern here 1 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #frostedbraidset drops design pattern pu-076 yarn group b + a ------------------------------------------------------- * whole set **sizes** s/m - l/xl **yarn for whole set** drops puna from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-200 g colour 02 beige and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-75 g colour 56 marzipan or use drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-250 g colour 50 light beige and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-75 g colour 56 marzipan ------------------------------------------------------- * hat **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head-size 54/56 - 58/60 cm **yarn for hat** drops puna from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 02 beige and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25 g colour 56 marzipan or use drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 50 light beige and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-25 g colour 56 marzipan **needles for hat** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge for hat** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch with 1 strand of each quality on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches within 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches within 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/261-16-frosted-braid-neck-warmer
